page.title: 04HEALTH
page.content: Part of {KNOWSLEY ESTATE }has been leased to the {NORTH WEST WATER BOARD for the purpose of storing and cleansing drinking water.The site includes:3 reservoirs,a treatment works,a control room and a security system.Two of the reservoirs are open and contain 300,000,000 gallons but the other res. is completely covered and can hold 50,000,000 gals.There are 3 sources of supply:1){LAKE VYRNWY }68 miles away in {WALES} 2){RIVER DEE }in {CHESHIRE }24 miles away 3){RIVINGTON } 17 miles away in the {PENNINES}.All the water is pumped into the 2 uncovered res. and then sent to the cov.res. for treatment.This consists of filtering;adding chlorine;sometimes adding lime to adjust the PH .In all, more than 1,000,000 people are supplied from the {PRESCOT }works.
